    public class ControllerServer
extends java.lang.Object

    The server that listen to all the requests from the client Client will interact with the deployment server using the TCP connection...

      • run

        public void run()
        The main routine of the server Just listen all the request from each client and then open a thread to deal with each client socket. Client here means all the physical machines you want to do the deployment.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
